name: Lolo the beagle
description:
Lolo is a happy dog who loves to eat and walk around the neighborhood when the day is nice because he hates water. He goes for a walk every morning in search of treasures for his stomach but there are some doggy or human neighbors who get angry because Lolo enters their property to steal their bones and they go out to chase him.

At the end of the walk, Lolo returns home to spend some time with his family and rest from his exhausting day.
